title: Basil and Sun-dried Tomato Bread
ingredients: ['2 1/4 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', '400g (14 oz) bread flour', '3 tablespoons wheat bran', '5 tablespoons quinoa', '3 tablespoons dried milk powder', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '25g (1 oz) sun-dried tomatoes, chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '280ml (10 fl oz) water', '225ml (8 fl oz) boiling water to cover']
